zh: 随同于永波访问的广州军区政委刘书田、兰州军区副司令员兼兰州军区空军司令员马晓天、南京军区政治部主任刘永治、总政治部秘书长程宝山、国防部外事办公室副主任张邦栋等同机抵京。
en: Liu Shutian, Political Commissar of Guangzhou Military Region, Ma Xiaotian, Deputy Commander of Lanzhou Military Region and Air Force Commander of Lanzhou Military Region, Liu Yongzhi, Director of Political Department of Nanjing Military Region, Cheng Baoshan, Secretary General of General Political Department, Zhang Bangdong, Deputy Director of Foreign Affairs Office of the Ministry of National Defense, etc. >Same planearrive in Beijing.

zh: 新华社圣地亚哥１２月１１日电（记者侯耀其）智利圣地亚哥上诉法院第五庭１１日下午做出初审裁决，宣布接受前军政府领导人皮诺切特辩护律师团提出的上诉，推翻古斯曼法官本月１日签发的关于审判皮诺切特的决定。
en: Xinhua The appeal filed by Chet's defense lawyers overturned the decision issued by Judge Guzman on the 1st of this month on the trial of Pinochet.

zh: 二话不说就拿出匿藏在背后的西瓜刀见人就砍。一时间服务中心职员四处奔逃，但其中一人因为滑倒被歹徒砍伤背部。
en: Without saying a word, he took out the watermelon knife hidden behind his back and cut it when he saw it. For a time, the service center staff ran around, but one of them was slashed in the back by the thugs for slipping.
